ClassDesc: This class represents the UI (e.g. Fragment/Activity) hosting playback controls and defines the interaction between @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlaybackGlue_E@ and the host. PlaybackGlueHost provides the following functions: Render UI of PlaybackGlue: @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlaybackGlueHost#setPlaybackRow_E@, @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlaybackGlueHost#setPlaybackRowPresenter_E@. Client for fragment/activity onStart/onStop: @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlaybackGlueHost#setHostCallback_E@. Auto fade out controls after a short period: @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlaybackGlueHost#setFadingEnabled_E@. Key listener and ActionListener. @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlaybackGlueHost#setOnKeyInterceptListener_E@, @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlaybackGlueHost#setOnActionClickedListener_E@. Subclass of PlaybackGlueHost may implement optional interfaces: @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#SurfaceHolderGlueHost_E@ to provide SurfaceView for video playback. @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#PlaybackSeekUi_E@ to provide seek UI to glue These optional interfaces should be accessed by glue in @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlaybackGlue#onAttachedToHost_E@.
